flawed_nl_solution:
He shoots 200*4=<<200*4=800>>800 shots per week
He can recover 800*0.2=<<800*0.2=160>>160 of those arrows
So he uses 800-160=<<800-160=460>>460 arrows a week
The cost for those arrows would come out to 460*5.5=$<<460*5.5=2530>>2530 per week
His team pays for 2530*0.7=$<<2530*0.7=1771>>1771 of that
So he has to pay 2530-1771=$<<2530-1771=759>>759 per week for arrows
#### 759

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 640, not 460. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
